thread.title: Khloe Kardashian, James Harden call things off over Odom
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian, James Harden call things off over Odom

author: Steve DelVecchio
title: Khloe Kardashian, James Harden call things off over Odom
text:
Khloe Kardashian, James Harden call things off over Odom Larry Brown Sports 14 hrs ago Steve DelVecchio Khloe Kardashian has reportedly put her relationship with James Harden on hold so she can focus on being there for Lamar Odom.
AdChoices According to TMZ, Kardashian has vowed to be by Odom’s side when he begins physical and speech therapy, which is expected to take months to complete.
Kardashian and Harden had been dating for several months, and things became official when Khloe attended the famed Drew League game to watch her boyfriend play . Harden had been sharing photos on social media that indicated he was quickly becoming part of the Kardashian clan, but things have obviously changed in a hurry.
Kardashian and Odom finalized their divorce back in July, but a judge has yet to sign off on the papers. It’s unclear if they will attempt to withdraw them.
Odom has been transported from a Las Vegas hospital to a medical facility in Los Angeles, and his condition is said to be improving. However, one of the latest reports on Odom’s health indicates the former NBA star could still need at least one major medical procedure . © Troy Taormina-USA TODAY Sports The months-long relationship between James Harden and Khloe Kardashian reportedly has been put on hold in the wake of the Lamar Odom incident.
